Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item; it's a solution designed to enhance your experience significantly. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you for $125. This price reflects the investment we've made into its development and the high-quality materials used. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
